feed.title: Category: interview | A Woman's Journey Through Technology

entry.title: Code Fellows accepts my code sample
entry.content:
September 3, 2013

News!

Two fretful weeks later, the news finally arrives. My coding sample was accepted and I’ve made it to the final step in the process…the 10 minute in-person interview.

Yikes!


~ Geeky Mama Mare ~

entry.title: Code Fellows interview
entry.content:
September 5, 2013

The interview

I must not have done very well. Had a hard time answering easy interview questions like what is a class vs a method. What is MVC? I feel so stupid when trying to answer these sorts of interview questions. I stammer. I get my technical terms mixed up. I am going to need to practice these sorts of interview questions and get better at my technical glib.


~ Geeky Mama Mare ~
